ComicInfo.Summary:
Master Darque is determined to gain the secrets of the Geomancers! Geoff calls upon Gilad, the Fist and Steel for protection, but will it be enough?
In 12 B.C. Gilad slays an evil sorcerer with the soul-trapping blade, the Bagh-Nakh. In the present, Buck McHenry is captured by Master Darque, who tortures him for the secrets of the Geomancers. Feeling this through his psychic link, current Geomancer Geoff McHenry painfully bids Gilad to use the Bagh-Nakh to kill his Uncle Buck, and thus prevents those secrets from falling into Darque's hands!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/eternal-warrior-6-time-space/4000-36694/

ComicInfo.Title: Time & Space
